name: Io.Smash Fun for All Year Old
name_original: Io.Smash Fun for All Year Old
description:
The challenging and interesting one-tap game that makes you addicting. io Smash is the game that pushes the cubes of your speed and reaction.

The splendid 3D effects enable you to get exciting experience coming along with excellent io graphic style.
Now, let’s get the control over the gameplay and defend the bottom line area from hungry cubes.

How to play:

Simply tap your finger on the squares before they reach the bottom line of the screen earning the highest score possible. Lots of fun and action.

Try it now, play and have fun!!!
